name: CanvasRenderingContext2D.createImageData
description: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.createImageData() method of the Canvas 2D API creates a new, blank ImageData object with the specified dimensions. All of the pixels in the new object are transparent black.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'CanvasRenderingContext2D.createImageData' in HTML Living Standard.
